description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The History of Pennsylvania from the Earliest Discovery to the Present Time, etc. [With illustrations and a portrait.]" Author: CORNELL, Wiliam Mason. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9615.ee.1." Page: 406 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1876 Publisher: Quaker City Publishing House Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000787967 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
